Patient 28: Patient 28 is a 35-year-old female who is currently pregnant and has a history of asthma and seasonal allergies. Her asthma is managed with albuterol as needed and a daily inhaled corticosteroid. She has a known allergy to sulfa drugs, which causes hives. Her family history includes a mother with asthma and a sister with eczema. Her medication regimen has been carefully adjusted to ensure safety during pregnancy.
